Pydio 5.3.1 - Dev Release

This is a development release, installation is not recommended on production environment. It is released for the purpose of testing new features, and more specifically the new Desktop Sync client. See http://pyd.io/ for more info.
Please beware of upgrading automatically from 5.2.3 to 5.3.1, this version is introducing massive changes and may break some existing links if not correctly migrated.

  • Date: June, 20th 2014
  • License: Affero GPL
  • Copyright: Charles du Jeu 2014
  • Upgrade: No-upgrade available yet, please deploy separately

Summary

  • Keep an up-to-date index and trigger a change feed via SQL triggers : used by the sync client
  • Split auth plugins into auth backends and auth frontends. Latter can be tested one by one until a credential is detected.
  • Create a "Keystore" based auth frontend for simplify REST api login
  • Enable routing between workspace via URL (backbone-based)
  • API enhancements
  • Massive refactoring of shares to store them in DB instead of data/public/ folder.
  • Massive refactoring for scalability when tons of users and tons of workspace
  • Italian translation
